sentences.en: Promote materialist dialectics and oppose metaphysics and scholasticism.
sentences.cn: 要提倡唯物辩证法，反对形而上学和烦琐哲学。

sentences.en: Suppose we accept all that metaphysics.
sentences.cn: 假设我们承认这些形而上学。

sentences.en: Additional terminology is always helpful for the learners of metaphysics.
sentences.cn: 另外，一些术语对于玄学的学习者来说也是有帮助的。
